## Rcpp

- RTools (Windows)
- Rcpp
- RcppArmadillo
- microbenchmark
- ggplot2
- Jupyter-lab avec r-irkernel (via conda) —> <https://github.com/IRkernel/IRkernel>

## futureverse

- Install quarto: <https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/>
- install.packages(“futureverse”)
- install.packages(“purrr”)

## Parallel computing with Rcpp in R

- Install packages tidyverse, Rcpp, bench, gt, sitmo, BH, RcppParallel, RcppProgress and RcppThread
- Install OpenMP sur macOS: <https://mac.r-project.org/openmp/>
